          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A flash light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein grelles Licht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une lumière instantanée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma luz flash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una luce istantanea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα φως λάμψης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una luz de destello</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light gets fainter as it gets further away from a flash light.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light source</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Licht erhält, es 
weiter entfernt von ein grelles Licht so schwächer auch erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière devient
tout plus faible qu'elle devient plus loin d'une lumière 
instantanée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz começa por 
mais mais fraca que comece mais adicional afastado de uma luz flash.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce ottiene 
per quanto ottenga più debole più lontano da una luce istantanea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το φως παίρνει πιό 
εξασθενημένο όπως παίρνει πιό μακρυά από ένα φως λάμψης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz consigue tan
más débil que consigue más futura lejos de una luz de destello.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtquelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">source lumineuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fonte clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fonte di luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πηγή φωτός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuente de luz</string>
          </keyword>
